_meanings:
{@--1@} To attend
upon, worship, attend 
respectfully; {#paryupAsyaMta lakzyA#} <ls>R. 10. 62</ls>;  
<ls>Ku. 2. 38</ls>; <ls>Ms. 7. 37.</ls>

{@--2@} To go to (for
protection), resort to, seek shelter
or patronage with; {#aSaktA eva sarvatra#}
{#naredraM paryupAsate#} <ls>Pt. 1. 241.</ls>
